name: places/ChIJcao49pLzwokRiBmwBkNyfTM
adrFormatAddress: 94 W 225th St, Bronx, NY 10463, USA

originalText.text: So i work with a Brace Company Eschen P& O LABS, called this company three times in total on 12/14/21. The Representatives that work here are very very very unprofessional. This was my first time calling this company and to be very honest, i will make it my best to never call this company again. The attitude on the phone is too uncalled for and completely unnecessary. Rep Murta ( however she spells her name) and  Rep Hilda made it no better. The rudest representatives.

originalText.text: Completely rude and not professional. Not everyone is rude but there was this certain person whose name was Sandra. If you are helping out someone speaking the same language as you, you should be willing to help out. This person had the most unprofessional manner her tone was like she was too lazy to help out and hung up the phone without even letting me finish my sentence. I called back and spoke with a different person, she was kind enough to walk me through the process and in the background I hear the person complaining why I am calling again when I was just doing the best I could to help someone out. I don't know what they look in people when they hire them, but she was just completely rude and unprofessional in every single aspect.

originalText.text: This place is a complete joke. They play with people's money and it has to end. I contacted Linda who a nurse who only comes out 2 times a year....who even of you call her boss she won't do her job. Her boss who's name is Romaine is another complete joke. I work for an agency and when it comes to over time they play like they can't see the HHA system, so why even do home care if you don't know how to get into system..... This is the 2nd time they haven't authorized an over time for me. I wasn't going to write a review but I'm tired of them playing with money. I don't work for free it took them almost 7 months to give the woman I work for extra hrs and her condition changed multiple times... And the nurse Linda played like she never saw the discharge papers. I hope the owner see's this review and I will be making a trip to the office. Since they never get my agencies faxed documents or the changes in the system..... This has to stop they don't care about people.... I have bills to pay... I don't work for free if we get stuck in Manhattan or long land traffic or at an appointment because there was an issue.... I'm still on the clock I don't clock out until I get her home, something to eat and in her home safe.........

originalText.text:
This place this a zoo. No-one knows anything and everyone is incompetent.
I LITERALLY HAVE TO DO ALL the paper work for them. Nurse care manager Amed Wally is a complete idiot! He knows ABSOLUTELY  nothing. He will say he will take care of matters and then will NEVER call you back when he says he will. You literally have to hound him! Only time things gets done is when you go above and complain to Elery Smith. Please reconsider placing your parent or yourself here. It is very sad, disappointing and scary to have this agency who claims to care for you and they do not.

originalText.text: I called on Friday 9:00am for a transportation appointment, the lady said I will get a call back ( but no one call me back) so I call on again on Saturday, they said they can’t schedule appointment during the weekend! Very nice service, I have to pay by myself for my transportation on Monday at 8:00am which is they will “call” me back again
